extension.description: The 3DO Interactive Multiplayer is a game console developed by the 3DO Company. Panasonic produced the first models in 1993, and further models were released by Sanyo and GoldStar (now LG) in 1994.
El 3DO Interactive Multiplayer es una consola de juegos desarrollada por la compañía 3DO. Panasonic produjo los primeros modelos en 1993, y Sanyo y GoldStar (ahora LG) lanzaron otros modelos en 1994.
